title: Configure View link in Action column to open in same tab
author: Caitlin Neppl
content:
Currently the "View" link in the Action column of a Conga Grid will open a new webpage either in a new browser tab or (using Salesforce Console Navigation) a new Salesforce subtab.
 
A certain use case would benefit greatly from the View link opening/redirecting to the same tab - "This current behavior is an issue because, we have automation that takes place when a record is updated. Because this record opens in a new tab, the user doesn't receive the updates from the automation when going back to the original tab UNLESS they refresh that original browser tab." 
 
Providing this configuration option would allow the product to better accommodate a variety of use cases and user preferences

comments.content: Thank you for your idea submission. I'm afraid I don't fully understand the requirment. Is it possible to review this with you.

title: Enhanced Grid View for Increased Data Visibility Without Scrolling
author: Dan John
content: To address the issue of limited screen visibility and excessive scrolling, we propose implementing a feature that allows users to view more data without the need for constant scrolling. This enhancement will ensure that users can see a comprehensive view of their data, especially on laptops, by optimizing the display layout. By reducing the need to scroll both horizontally and vertically, this feature will improve user experience and productivity.

comments.content: Conga will continue to optimize Grid for usability, but due to the configurability options available within Grid there may be a need for scrolling that is dependent on the amount of data being surfaced.

title: Restrict Grid View Visibility for Permission Groups Despite "View All Data" Permission
author: Dan John
content: To enhance privacy and data security, we propose implementing a feature that restricts users in specific permission groups from viewing other users' grid views, even if they have the "View All Data" permission. This will ensure that individual grid views remain private and inaccessible to unauthorized users, aligning with business requirements for confidentiality without compromising necessary permissions for other processes.

comments.content: Conga Grid will continue to respect Salesforce settings.

title: Enhanced Copy and Paste Functionality for Grid Values Across Browsers
author: Dan John
content: To improve usability, we propose a feature that allows users to copy and paste values directly from the grid without highlighting the text. This feature should work consistently across all browsers, including Edge and Chrome. Unlike the current behavior where Edge displays complete text or values in pop-ups or mini page layouts, this enhancement will ensure seamless copy-paste functionality across all browsers, providing a more efficient user experience.

comments.content: Can we set up a call to review this workflow before deciding on whether to take it into our roadmap?

title: Automatic Refresh of Conga Grid upon New Record Addition
author: Dan John
content: To enhance user experience and streamline task management, we propose implementing an automatic refresh feature for the Conga Grid. Currently, users must manually refresh the grid to see new tasks or updates, which disrupts their workflow. With this enhancement, the Conga Grid will automatically refresh whenever new records are added or existing ones are updated or closed, ensuring users always have the most up-to-date information without manual intervention. This will improve workflow efficiency, provide real-time task management, and enhance overall user satisfaction

comments.content: This seems like a useful addition, and we will take a look at this.

title: Batch Task On Grid Vs Salesforce Action
author: Atta Mmorosa
content: When receiving emails for Tasks within Salesforce is enabled, the function works fine when creating a Task in Salesforce but on Conga Grid, it is not sending out the email that Salesforce is sending out.

title: Allow Click to Dial within Grid
author: Lindsey Covington
content: Right now, you are unable to click the phone number in the Grid and it bring up a 3rd party click to dial integration. Within SF, you can set it up this way.

title: Chatter in Grid View staying in Lightning instead of toggling between Classic &Lightning
author: Atta Mmorosa
content: Instead of toggling between Lightning and Classic, they want to keep the Lightning UI in the Reading Pane for Grid - https://www.screencast.com/t/uuiVtBnkAaG - Toggle Lightning/Classic Chatter (https://www.screencast.com/t/uuiVtBnkAaG)

title: Customer wants an Auto Save feature whenever something within a grid is changed
author: Atta Mmorosa
content: They expressed the few clicks in regards to saving the current view they are on. Apparently it is time consuming to have to consistently hit the save button.
